controller

Class FacadeControllerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FacadeControllerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceClient

    public class FacadeControllerClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceClient
    Provides a simplified interface to the methods the customers need.
